dopedhorses.midnightconfig.title: Doped Horses Configuration
dopedhorses.midnightconfig.shoeModifierC: A horse speed is ~0.2, so if you put 0.2, the speed of the horse will be 0.4 so 2x faster.
dopedhorses.midnightconfig.jumpModifierC: Horse's jump strength ranges from 0.4–1.0, with an average of 0.7. A jump strength of 0.5 is enough to clear 1 9⁄16 blocks, while 1.0 is enough to clear 5 1⁄4 blocks.
dopedhorses.midnightconfig.shoeLootComme: [Need a restart] A value between 0 and 1 (0.1 = 10%, 0.2=20% etc....), those items loots in chest in the nether / portal ruins
Faster blocks Format: <regex bloc>=<multiplier>. Look at the default examples :) it's not mandatory to include a regex. You can simply write the block you want such as : sand=0.2
dopedhorses.midnightconfig.explainCommen: The server config will only work in a self hosted world. In order to get it working on your server, what you can do is going in solo world and finding the best settings. Then, you go in your .minecraft/config and you copy paste the doped_horses.json file into your server config file
